actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to extend the fisheries zone of the United States to a distance of 200 miles from the shore of the United States or beyond in certain instances to a point where the sea's depth is more than 200 meters.

summary.text: Extends the contiguous fishery zone of the United States from nine miles beyond the territorial waters of the United States to 197 miles beyond that border.

titles.title: A bill to extend the fisheries zone of the United States to a distance of 200 miles from the shore of the United States or beyond in certain instances to a point where the sea's depth is more than 200 meters.
